comment: I had Raymond for Chem Lab. Really chill, basically does the entire lab in front of you and shows you how to do the calculations. Super lenient grader but attendance is mandatory. If you need help either he or the TA will help you out. Definitely take if you can.

Mr. Raymond wants all of his lab students to succeed. He takes just enough time at the beginning of class to explain the lab and answer questions, but leaves enough time where you will most likely get out early almost every lab. I took the 8 pm lab and even that was made bearable with this professor, getting out at 10:45 sometimes. Highly recommend.

He's a great professor. He explains the lab of how to do it and gives you the calculations for them. If you have questions, ask him and he will answer them. There are quizzes to complete before lab and the answers for them can be found on Quizlet. You also have to do a sds and chem notebook along with a final. Pay attention and you will be fine.

This is the best Lab professor KSU has, he is not a tough grader at all. If you do the lab correctly you'll get an A on the lab report! He is VERY understanding and want you to do your best! ABSOLUTELY the best lab professor and I am very upset he is not teaching Chem 1212L
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Would take again

comment: He's freaking awesome! He's so nice and helps with any questions you have. The quizzes on D2L are all found on quizlet and he drops two low grades. Highly recommend

Awesome teacher considering it was his first time teaching. Basically gave you the calculations for labs, you just had to switch his data for yours. Easy A if you're willing to put in the necessary work and effort.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Raymond was great for lab. Everything is very straightforward and clear for what to do. Even if there's something you don't understand, he's there to help you during lab. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Dr. Raymond is a very good lab teacher. He performs the lab himself to show us all how to do it. He will answer any question you ask and helps out with the lab report. I learned a lot and will take him again!
